1.name: Kazunori Sato
1.title: Staff Developer Advocate
1.shortBio: Kaz Sato is Staff Developer Advocate at Cloud Platform team...
1.bio: Kaz Sato is Staff Developer Advocate at Cloud Platform team, Google Inc. He leads the developer advocacy team for Machine Learning and Data Analytics products, such as TensorFlow, Cloud ML, and BigQuery. Speaking at major events including Google I/O 2016, Hadoop Summit 2016, Strata+Hadoop World 2016 San Jose and NYC, ODSC East/West 2016, Google Next 2015 NYC and Tel Aviv. Kaz also has been leading and supporting developer communities for Google Cloud for over 7 years. He is also interested in hardwares and IoT, and has been hosting FPGA meetups since 2013.

2.name: Maru Maruyama
2.title: Solution Architect
2.shortBio: Maru Maruyama is a solution architect, JAPAC....
2.bio: Maru Maruyama is a solution architect, JAPAC. He is taking care of monthly GDE meeting as Maps expert in Japan. His current expertise is to boost up the Location based game like Pokemon GO for gaming developers. He has a YouTube channel to lecture the Maps APIs.  At the session, he will introduce about Maps APIs and usecase. Further, he will explain about recent approach for gaming industry and how to utilize Maps APIs for them.

3.name: Kinni Mew
3.title: Co-founder
3.shortBio: Mr. Kinni Mew is the co-founder of Mindlayer.
3.bio: Mr. Kinni Mew is the co-founder of Mindlayer. As a young company, its innovative projects have received fundings like Technology Start-up Support Scheme for Universities (TSSSU) 2016/17, Cyberport Incubation Programme 2016/17 and DBS Accelerator Program2016. In 2015, Mr. Kinni Mew was nominated by CityU to join the Cyberport University Partnership Programme (CUPP). In collaboration with Stanford Graduate School of Business, Mr. Kinni Mew went to Silicon Valley for a one-week entrepreneurship boot camp and visited Google, Facebook Headquarters and other companies at Silicon Valley. Mr. Mew was then awarded with cash prize of HK$100,000 in the ‘Global Entrepreneurship week China-Hong Kong’.

4.name: David Ng
4.title: Product Manager
4.shortBio: David is a Product Manager at Skygear.io, an open source backend for mobile apps and web apps...
4.bio: David is a Product Manager at Skygear.io, an open source backend for mobile apps and web apps. He joined Oursky as a full stack developer in 2012. He's interested in software product design and development.

5.bio: Google Cloud Platform Hong Kong User Group

6.name: Fung Lam
6.title: Organizer
6.bio: Fung is an Android Developer, focusing on Cloud and Mobile. Before that, he was a full-stack DevOpt on Java, on Linux, and on MySQL. Fung is a lead organizer in Google Developer Groups (GDG). He is also speakers in Tech Talks and Code-Labs in different GDG events in different cities.

7.name: Tony Chan
7.title: Head of Developer Platform Partnership for APAC (excl. JP/KR)
7.shortBio: Tony is the Head of Developer Platform Partnership for APAC (excl. JP/KR)...
7.bio: Tony is the Head of Developer Platform Partnership for APAC (excl. JP/KR).  He joined Google in 2007 and has been empowering developers, from startups to fortune 500 companies, to build high quality and innovative integrations with various Google technologies like Daydream/Tango, Firebase, Google Play Services on open platforms like Android and the web.  Prior joining Google, Tony was a senior application developer at the University of Michigan and a management consultant at PricewaterhouseCooper.  He received his M.S.E. and M.B.A. degrees from University of Michigan, Ann Arbor.

8.name: John Lee & his team
8.title: John Lee & his IVE(TY) team
8.shortBio: John and his team are students...
8.bio: John and his team are students of the Higher Diploma in Game Software Development at the Institute of Vocational Education (Tsing Yi).

9.name: Homing Tam
9.title: Google Developers Expert
9.shortBio: Homing was recognized by Google as a member of GDE....
9.bio: Homing was recognized by Google as a member of the Google Developers Experts (GDE) community focusing in Maps API. He gives speeches, workshops and works closely with the Google Maps team. His other focus includes Google Cloud Platform & Google Analytics.

10.name: Troy Ye
10.title: GIS Specialist
10.shortBio: Troy is a GIS Specialist at Master Concept....
10.bio: Troy is a GIS Specialist at Master Concept. He’s been working with Google Maps and 360 degree photos for some time. He also works on prototype application with the Project Tango Development Kit.
